quest.name: To Guard a Guardian
journal: Miounne has a mind to assign you a mission of great import.
Miounne tells you that the Guardian Tree, held sacred by the Gridanians, may fall under Ixali attack. She gives you a letter and bids you deliver it to Bowlord Lewin at the Seat of the First Bow.
A large Ixali force has amassed at the Guardian Tree. Make all haste to Everschade, and assist in the great tree's defense.
You have succeeded in repelling the Ixal, whom evidence suggests were acting under the command of the mysterious masked mage.

What is the significance of the black crystal that was left at the scene, and who exactly are the two scholars from Sharlayan? For now, set aside your questions, and make your way back to the Seat of the First Bow, where Bowlord Lewin awaits.

At the Seat of the First Bow, you are graciously received by Elder Seedseer Kan–E–Senna. As a token of her gratitude for saving the day, she invites you to serve as Emissary in the forthcoming Greenbliss ceremony. Touched by her gesture, you are inspired anew to continue to strive for the good of Gridania.
objectives: Deliver Miounne's letter to Bowlord Lewin.
Make haste to the Guardian Tree.
Return to the Seat of the First Bow and speak with Lewin.

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text: Time is of the essence, so I shall speak plain.

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text: Based on Luquelot's observations, the Ixal have designs on the Guardian Tree, and they mean to act soon.

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text: The tree is the oldest living thing in this ancient forest, and it is held sacred by every forestborn Gridanian.

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text: Should it come to any harm, the elementals would fly into a rage beyond pacifying. I dread to think of the chaos that would ensue.

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text: There isn't much time. We must act quickly.

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text: Forename, please see this letter to the hands of Bowlord Lewin, at the Seat of the First Bow in Quiver's Hold. Should the need arise, pray put yourself wholly at the man's disposal. I strongly suspect he will need all the able-bodied souls he can muster.

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text: The fate of Gridania hangs in the balance. Go swiftly, Forename.

dialogue.name: DOORMANSINYU
dialogue.text: An urgent message from Mother Miounne? Very well, you may enter.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Proceed to the Seat of the First Bow?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: DOORMANSINYU
dialogue.text: Mayhap the messenger has forgotten the message? Should you gather your wits, I will be here.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: So you are Forename Surname, the adventurer of whom I have heard so much. I understand you wish words with me.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: Miounne has information on the Ixal, you say? Speak freely─you have both my ears.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: ...Matron forfend! They mean to defile the Guardian Tree?

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: Before Nophica, I swear those filthy birdmen will not touch it─nay, not so much as a single leaf!

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: Twelve help me! How can it be that neither the Wood Wailers nor the Gods' Quiver caught wind of this?

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: I cannot help but think this plot bears the mark of the masked devil who has eluded us for so long. We must be wary─this incursion may be more than it seems.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text:
Ah, would that the Warriors of Light were still with us...
But this is no time for such idle thoughts. I thank you for delivering this message. You may assure Miounne that I will dispatch a unit of my best men to investi─

dialogue.name: SINYUSOLA
dialogue.text: My lord!

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: What is it!?

dialogue.name: SINYUSOLA
dialogue.text: It's the Ixal, sir! The Ixal have amassed at the Guardian Tree!

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: Already!? Bloody hells...

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: Forename─Miounne believes you capable, and I can think of no better judge than she. Lend us your strength this day─aid in the defense of the Guardian Tree!

dialogue.name: SINYUCOMMAND
dialogue.text: The Bowlord sent you, yes? Good to have you with us!

dialogue.name: SINYUCOMMAND
dialogue.text: The birdmen have completely surrounded the Guardian Tree, and their calls grow more urgent by the minute.

dialogue.name: SINYUCOMMAND
dialogue.text: Whatever it is they mean to do, we cannot let them go through with it. They must be stopped, no matter the cost!

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text:
Duty calls. Do you wish to proceed with
“To Guard a Guardian”?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: IXALPRIESTS
dialogue.text:
(-Ixali Occultists-)O mournful voice of creation!
O mournful voice of time!

dialogue.name: IXALGURU
dialogue.text: Squaaawk! Attend me, all!

dialogue.name: IXALGURU
dialogue.text: To us, this forest, Tinolqa, belongs!

dialogue.name: IXALGURU
dialogue.text: Wisdom of Paragons, we possess! To our former glory, restore us it will!

dialogue.name: IXALGURU
dialogue.text: From this tree, a great crystal we take! Unto Garuda, an offering we shall make!

dialogue.name: IXALGURU
dialogue.text: Unfeathered ones and elementals, banish we shall! Our ancient home, reclaim we will! Squaaawk!

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: First squad, left flank. Second and third, right flank.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: The rest, form the main host with me. It is high time we reminded our Ixal guests why we Quivermen are to be feared!

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: This position is yours, adventurer. May the elementals keep you!

dialogue.name: IXALGURU
dialogue.text: Squawk!?

dialogue.name: IXALGURU
dialogue.text: Interrupt us, you dare!? In your own blood, you shall bathe!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Defeat the Ixal!

dialogue.name: SINYUSOLB
dialogue.text: Impressive work, adventurer.

dialogue.name: SINYUSOLB
dialogue.text: The Bowlord bids you hold this position. Enemies may yet lurk near, so stay on your guard.

dialogue.name: SINYUSOLB
dialogue.text: We go to bolster the left flank, where the battle yet rages.

dialogue.name: MASKEDMAGUS
dialogue.text: The source of herhis strength becomes clear...

dialogue.name: MASKEDMAGUS
dialogue.text: You may have bested the golem, but you will not fare so well this day.

dialogue.name: MASKEDMAGUS
dialogue.text: O mournful voice of creation! Send unto me a creature of the abyss, my thrall to command, that I may smite mine enemies!

dialogue.name: MASKEDMAGUS
dialogue.text: Your very being imperils the plan. You cannot be suffered to live.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Defeat the masked mage!

dialogue.name: MASKEDMAGUS
dialogue.text: Unnngh... That the wisdom of the Paragons should be brought low...by mere mortals...

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: ...Paragons?

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: That's what I heard.

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: The Bringers of Chaos...or Ascians, to give them their proper name.

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: It would seem our suspicions were correct─it is they who have been manipulating the beast tribes.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: Forename, are you unharmed!? Had I known this creature was near, I would have sent men, not called them away!

dialogue.name: SINYUSOLB
dialogue.text: There is no mistake, sir─he is the one who stirred the Ixal from their nest. Our intelligence was reliable.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: So this is the man who has eluded us for so long?

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Right! We finally got him!

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: We sensed an ominous presence, and came here as swiftly as our legs would carry us.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Well, it's good to know what we're up against, anyway.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: My thanks as ever, friends.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: Quivermen! Move out!

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: To say you played an instrumental role in the success of this mission would scarcely do justice to your efforts this day, adventurer. Upon your return to Gridania, pray visit me at Quiver's Hold. I will see to it that you receive the thanks you are due.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Hmmm...you're probably wondering why we always seem to appear when there's trouble, right?

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Well, trust me when I tell you that it's almost never our fault. Despite what it looks like, Papalymo and I are actually helping the Gridanians. And we've been doing so for a good few years, too. Oh! Did I mention that we're not from around here?

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Hm? Why, yes, we are Sharlayans! However did you know?

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: So I wasn't mistaken...

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Mistaken? About what?

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: Nothing. Nothing at all.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Awww! You always do that! Mumble something loaded with meaning, only to keep it to yourself when someone asks! It's unfair! And it's especially unfair when the someone is me!

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: Oh, do calm down! I'll tell you later.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: Hmph! I bet you won't. Anyway, all's well that ends well.

dialogue.name: PAPALYMO
dialogue.text: ...Quite. We'd best be on our way.

dialogue.name: YDA
dialogue.text: See you later!

dialogue.name: DOORMANSINYU
dialogue.text: Welcome back, adventurer. Your exploits at the Guardian Tree are the stuff of songs. The Bowlord awaits you within.

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: Proceed to the Seat of the First Bow?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: DOORMANSINYU
dialogue.text: Let me know when you are ready to proceed, and I will admit you.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: I have awaited your return, Forename. Allow me to thank you again for helping us to defend the Guardian Tree.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: Not only did you put the invading Ixal to rout─you confronted the masked mage and his fell minion, and emerged the victor.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: I have good men and women under me, none of whom give me cause for complaint─but you, Forename, are a class apart.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: Your strength, your determination, your heart...

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: You have all the makings of a great adventurer. Miounne is seldom mistaken in her appraisals, and she is plainly not mistaken now.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: Gridania is stronger for your presence. The Elder Seedseer will doubtless be pleased to learn that a capable adventurer like you has come to us.

dialogue.name: LEWIN
dialogue.text: Once more, I thank you. Owing to your valor, disaster has been averted.

dialogue.name: SINYUSOL
dialogue.text: Elder Seedseer!

dialogue.name: SINYUSOL
dialogue.text: My lady!

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: I am come to express my gratitude for your valiant efforts before the Guardian Tree.

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: I am informed that an adventurer of singular talent now walks amongst us. You are shehe, are you not?

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: Hm? You seem...familiar to me. We have...met before?

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: No...I do not believe we have.

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: Forgive me. Mayhap you are merely exactly as I pictured you when the elementals told me of your deeds.

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: My name is Kan-E-Senna, and it is my solemn charge to watch over all who call Gridania home.

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: Well met and well come to our fair nation.

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: It was your valor that won us the day, I believe. On behalf of all Gridanians, I offer you my humblest thanks.

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: This gift I present to you as a small token of my gratitude. I hope that you will ever remain a friend to Gridania.

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: Greenbliss is coming. It is an age-old ceremony to renew the bond between man and elemental.

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: Over the centuries, it has blossomed into a joyous festival encompassing Gridanians from every walk of life.

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: I should be most gratified if you would participate in the ceremony as Emissary.

dialogue.name: SINYUSOL
dialogue.text: <gasp>

dialogue.name: SINYUSOL
dialogue.text: Such a great honor!

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: I look forward to seeing you on that most joyous of days.

dialogue.name: KANESENNA
dialogue.text: Till then, fare you well. May you walk in the light of the Crystal.

dialogue.name: WOODWAILERLANCE
dialogue.text: Protect the Guardian Tree with your lives! For Gridania!

dialogue.name: ARCHER
dialogue.text: Do not lower your guard! The next wave comes!

dialogue.name: MASKEDMAGE
dialogue.text: You will perish here!

dialogue.name: MASKEDMAGE
dialogue.text: Where...? Where do you get such strength!?

dialogue.name: IDA
dialogue.text: In the nick of time!

dialogue.name: IDA
dialogue.text: Looks like you could do with a hand!

dialogue.name: IDA
dialogue.text: Hurry it up, Papalymo!

dialogue.name: PAPARIMO
dialogue.text: I trust you won't object to our assistance!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: The enemy chieftain is mine!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: We shall engage the main flock!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: A voidsent!? Th-This bodes ill!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Another wave!? Where are they coming from!?

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Wisdom of Paragons, almighty is!
Perish, unfeathered ones shall!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Creature of the abyss! Mine enemies, strike down!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Ugh... Is this...the end?

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Hold fast! We almost have him!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Stubborn bastards...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: You must not...fail...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: I was...careless...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: I'm done for...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Soon, you shall take your vile gifts to the grave!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text:
Mwahahaha! Writhe!
Writhe as the venom eats its way through your veins!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Unwelcome guests... No matter, all shall fall before me!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: How is this possible...?

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: I trust you won't object to our assistance!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Looks like you could do with a hand!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Whence comes your strength!?

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: It is past time we finished this!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Come on! We're almost there!
